item.description:
We continue our study of William James with the final six short essays from his collection The Will to Believe.

The Moral Philosopher and the Moral Life (1891)

Great Men and Their Environment (1880)

The Importance of Individuals (1890)

On Some Hegelisms (1881)

What Psychical Research Has Accomplished (1892)

Gospel of Relaxation (1897)

Also, if you didn't get time to read it before take a look at The Sentiment of Rationality (1878) from the first half of The Will to Believe.
item.name: Skype Meeting-William James III
